I don't have synaptic in front of me, so I can't give you exact instructions, but there is a list of upgradeable packages under the "custom filters" option
you just need to right click on it and choose the "upgrade" option
or press <ctrl>f (or use the menus) to find a specific package

as I said, just right click on the packages you want to upgrade, and choose the upgrade option from the menu.
